Reviews.Title: light weight, but a light-weight
Reviews.Author: J. Pohl "musical engineer"
Reviews.Content: Weighs just shy of 3.5 oz; lighter than an ipod touch.  Works fine with a T-mobile (3G) SIM card.=> Lacks a forward-facing camera, so you can't skype video calls.The screen has poor sensitivity; I need to really press hard with my fingernail.And, the screen is not multi-touch: with an iphone, to expand the screen you simply draw your two fingertips apart.  With this phone, you need to push (with your fingernail point) on a little "+" icon to expand the screen.  Screen resolution isn't as good as an iphone.All in all, it's a fine phone if light weight is more important than acuity.
